Show Reel

Journalist, podcaster, and feminist.

Mariah Lattas holds a Bachelor of Media and Bachelor of Arts (Politics and International Relations) from the Univeristy of Adelaide.

Mariah is co-host of Pink Rabbit on Radio Adelaide 101.5 and JOY 94.9 and also co-hosts The Milkbar with Benito Carbone for postup.

Mariah will be travelling to the United States in early 2020 to observe the 2020 Presidential Election Primaries. If you would like her to write for you from the field, please get in touch.

CV

Experience

Sales Consultant at LUSH Cosmetics 2019 — Present

Operations Specialist at Apple 2017 — 2019
